text.div:
BundleDeIdentify

OPERATION: BundleDeIdentify

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/medmorph/OperationDefinition/Bundle-de-identify

Generates a de-identified bundle taking an instance of a Bundle containing PHI/PII data. The de-identification algorithm to be used is left to the implementers of the operation.

URL: [base]/Bundle/$deidentify

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INinputBundle1..1Bundle

An input bundle instance that needs to be de-identified

OUToutputBundle0..1Bundle

Upon successful de-identification, the de-identified bundle is returned back from the service.

OUTissues0..1OperationOutcome

A list of hints and warnings about problems encountered while de-identifying the bundle.

name: BundleDeIdentify
title: Generate De-Identified Bundle
publisher: HL7 International - Public Health Work Group
description: Generates a de-identified bundle taking an instance of a Bundle containing PHI/PII data. The de-identification algorithm to be used is left to the implementers of the operation.

parameter.name: inputBundle
parameter.documentation: An input bundle instance that needs to be de-identified

parameter.name: outputBundle
parameter.documentation: Upon successful de-identification, the de-identified bundle is returned back from the service.

parameter.name: issues
parameter.documentation: A list of hints and warnings about problems encountered while de-identifying the bundle.
